ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Field Incompleted') && (NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_1__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_2__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_3__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_4__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_5__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_6__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_7__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_8__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_9__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_10__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_11__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_12__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_13__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_14__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK(Completion_Code_15__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please remove completion information in order to change the status to Field Incomplete
